name: The Farm of Fairy Glen
description:
The Farm of Fairy Glen

A homage to the awesome farm games out there a labor of love that was made with passion for the genre.

Choose your avatar and begin your farm journey. Set in the idyllic fantasy realm of Fairy Glen somewhere in the early twentieth century. 

Fall in love and build a relationship and build an awesome farm to boot...

Animals

Chickens, Cows, Sheep and Horses. 

Insects 

Butterflies, Silk spiders, Silk moths and Ladybirds.

Crops to grow in the 3 seasons that are arable.

Carrots, Raspberries, Blueberries, Potato, Kale and more.

And there is extensive foraging and mining.

With the items you craft and mine you can make something special. Craft amazing gifts and participate in cute festivals.

Business

Buy different businesses and help restore the Village of Fairy Glen to its former glory. 

Build

Improve your house and diversify your crafting potential. Purchase renovations for the local Temple and gain favor with the town folk.

Side note... there is a heavy focus on ecology. there is a biodiversity limit and a scientist character that works for the rain forest alliance. This game is not just a farm game but has a focus to raise awareness for the ailments the planet faces. As, well as neat events such as the Pub Quiz and library that are optional avenues for learning and testing your knowledge of this beautiful planet we live.

Additionally, this game was made with a passion for farm games and regarding this I have made a template that will allow you to make your own farm game using the RPGMaker MV software.  https://jbo.itch.io/rpg-maker-mv-farming-template

Demo Available on Sunday night!
